member.name: T:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController
member.summary: Feature Collections API

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the feature collection with the specified identifier.
member.remarks: If the provider supports associations of time series, spreadsheets etc., these associations will be included in the response if the associations parameter is set to true. The result can be filtered using query string parameters.
member.param: if set to true associations are returned.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetListByIds(System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of feature collections with the specified IDs
member.remarks: If the provider supports associations of time series, spreadsheets etc., these associations will be included in the response if the associations parameter is set to true.
member.param: if set to true associations are returned.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the total number of feature collections.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetFullNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all fullname identifiers.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is grouped (hierarchical).

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetIds(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all feature collection IDs.
member.remarks: The result can be filtered using query string parameters.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetGeometry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a geometry collection from the feature collection with the given ID.
member.remarks: Only the feature geometry is returned â€“ no properties (attributes) are included. The result can be filtered using query string parameters.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all feature collections within the given group. If no group is given, all feature collections are returned.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.QueryFeatureCollection(System.String,DHI.Services.WebApiCore.QueryDTO{DHI.Services.GIS.FeatureCollection{System.String}})
member.summary: Gets a list of all feature collection IDs fullfilling the given query

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.CreateFeatureCollection(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Creates a new feature collection.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.UpdateFeatureCollection(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Updates an existing feature collection.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.RemoveFeatureCollection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the feature collection with the given ID.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetFeatureCollectionEnvelope(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the feature collection envelope.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetFeatureCollectionFootprint(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Gets the feature collection footprint.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetFeatureIds(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the feature IDs for the feature collection with the given ID.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.QueryFeatures(System.String,System.String,DHI.Services.WebApiCore.QueryDTO{DHI.Spatial.IFeature},System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Queries the features.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.CreateFeature(System.String,System.String,DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.FeatureDTO)
member.summary: Creates a new feature in the feature collection with the give identifier.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.GetFeature(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the feature with the given ID within the feature collection with the given ID.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.UpdateFeature(System.String,System.String,DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.FeatureDTO)
member.summary: Updates a feature.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.RemoveFeature(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the feature with the given ID.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.RemoveFeatures(System.String,System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JArray)
member.summary: Removes the features with the given IDs.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.GISController.CreateAttribute(System.String,System.String,DHI.Services.GIS.WebApi.AttributeDTO)
member.summary: Creates a new attribute in the feature collection with the given ID.

member.summary: Remove attribute field from a feature collection
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.
